column4: I have a windows server 2003 acting as DNS + DHCP + AD. The domail in vtib0.local. I have added a record linuxsrv01(ubuntu server) to the dns. The problem is when I am on a ubuntu client. Which as an IP of the windows DHCP. I can't ping the server with ping linuxsrv01.vtib0.local . I CAN ping to the server with a windows client. NSLOOKUP linuxsrv01.vtib0.local gives on both linux and windows the correct IP. What is the problem?
isn't that a #windows question, based on a quick glance?
only ubuntu boxes have the problem
